# isPaused

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the system suspends the display link’s notifications to the target.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPaused: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can instruct the display link to stop sending notifications to the delegate by setting the property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. The property defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: isPaused
